name: Life Redesigned
description: With experiences in working with multinational and Fortune 500 companies, Life Redesigned core leadership philosophy is success is 80% psychology and 20% mechanics. That means all our leadership development and team coaching programs are designed to help participants change the way the think (psychology) and then giving them the tools to succeed (mechanics). Our hands-on coaching help to make behavioral change last and self-sustainable. Our work in Life Redesigned has been featured in different medias and our successes have not gone unnoticed. We have coached, trained, and delivered our leadership modules and workshops in more than 12 countries around the world. We have also been featured on Forbes Coaches Council, HuffPost, International Coaching Federation, Malaysia Tatler, and various media publications in Malaysia.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Life Redesigned coach and develop professionals and executives in the global workforce to create a better workplace.
ShortDescription: With experiences in working with multinational and Fortune 500 companies, Life Redesigned core leadership philosophy is success is 80% psychology and 20% mechanics.

Highlights.name: Life Coaching Services
Highlights.description: This article is about a life coaching company named Life Redesigned. The company offers coaching services to individuals and organizations.

Highlights.name: Goal: Achieve Peak Performance
Highlights.description: The company's goal is to assist people in achieving peak performance in all aspects of their lives, including work.

Highlights.name: Target Audience
Highlights.description: The article targets both individuals and organizations seeking to improve their performance.

enhanced_description: Life Redesigned offers leadership development and team coaching programs designed for professionals and executives in the global workforce, including multinational and Fortune 500 companies. Their core philosophy, emphasizing that success is 80% psychology and 20% mechanics, guides all programs to foster a change in mindset before providing practical tools. Through hands-on coaching, they aim to create lasting and self-sustainable behavioral change, helping individuals and organizations achieve peak performance and cultivate a better workplace. Specific offerings include the High Performance Leaders (HPL) Program, Workplace Culture Redefined, and Executive Coaching (1-1). Life Redesigned has delivered programs in over 12 countries and is recognized by publications like Forbes Coaches Council and the International Coaching Federation.
competitive_advantages: Extensive experience with multinational and Fortune 500 companies
Unique '80% psychology and 20% mechanics' core leadership philosophy
Focus on hands-on coaching for lasting behavioral change
Global delivery capability across more than 12 countries
Recognition and features in prominent media (e.g., Forbes Coaches Council, HuffPost, International Coaching Federation)
roi_benefits: Achievement of peak performance for individuals and organizations
Creation of a better workplace environment
scalability_features: Ability to deliver programs in more than 12 countries
Experience working with global and large enterprise organizations (multinational and Fortune 500 companies)
